Laetitia Heloise Arries bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa nke jere ozi dị ka onye otu National Assembly kemgbe Mee, na afọ 2019
Tupu a họpụta ya na ndị omeiwu, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye kansụl nke George Local Municipality
Arries bụ onye otu Economic Freedom Fighters.
Arries bụ onye otu Economic Freedom Fighters
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye kansụl PR nke George Local Municipality n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2016.
A họpụtara Arries ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu mba na ntuli aka e mere na 8 Mee na afọ 2019
N'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Mee afọ 2019, a ṅụrụ ya iyi dị ka onye omeiwu
Arries bụ otu n'ime ndị omeiwu EFF abụọ sitere na George
Onye omeiwu EFF ọzọ bụ Natasha Ntlangwini.

Arries jere ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya Kọmitii Portfolio na Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation n'etiti 27 Juun, na afọ 2019 na 6 Mee, na afọ 2020. N'abalị isii n'ọnwa Mee afọ 2020, ọ ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya Kọmitii Portfolio na Social Development.
